ProjectTitle: Transnational collaboration in contemporary refugee literature: authorship, textual effects, comparisons
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/01/2023
Data: If you decide to do interviews please make sure you have ethical and privacy approval before starting and submit an updated DMP with the approval number as intermediate. For more information see: www.kuleuven.be/english/research/ethics/committees/smec. 
Documentation: Will you use a reference manager or annotation software? If you like to have more information about RDM tools please have a look at www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/tools or contact rdm@kuleuven.be to make an appointment with a rdm specialist in your field. 
Storage: Please note that it is not recommended to store sensitive data on external hard disks, consult the storage guide to find a suitable KU Leuven storage solution: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. Also make sure to store your data as approved by SMEC. 
Preservation: Please note that the KU Leuven RDM policy asks to preserve data for a minimum of 10 years (unless this is not possible for example to protect the privacy of the participants) see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
label: good with suggestions
